awe6.interfaces.IEntityCollection

type
interface
implements
IAgendaManager
The IEntityCollection interface should be implemented by objects which compose multiple entities.

Instance Methods

addEntity( entity : IEntity, ?agenda : EAgenda, ?isAddedToView : Bool, ?viewPriority : Int ) : Void

parameters
entity The entity to add.
?agenda Assigns the entity to a specific agenda. If none is specified will assign to EAgenda.ALWAYS.
?isAddedToView If true will add the child entity's view to this object's view.
?viewPriority Sets the child entity's view stack priority order (higher numbers appear closer to the top of the stack).
Adds an entity to this object's children.

getEntities( ?agenda : EAgenda ) : Array<IEntity>

parameters
?agenda Used to filter results to the specified agenda.
returns
Array of matching entities.
Retrieves all child entities.

Consider this a runtime only method, rather than calling it during constructor or initialization phases.

getEntitiesByClass<T>( classType : Class<getEntitiesByClass.T>, ?agenda : EAgenda, ?isBubbleDown : Bool, ?isBubbleUp : Bool, ?isBubbleEverywhere : Bool ) : Array<getEntitiesByClass.T>

parameters
classType The type of class to match (can be any class, type or interface).
agenda Used to filter results to the specified agenda.
?isBubbleDown Set to true if you want to search this object's children for the requested entity.
?isBubbleUp Set to true if you want to search this object's parent for the requested entity.
?isBubbleEverywhere Set to true if you want to search the entire entity traversal stack for the requested entity.
returns
Array of matching entities.
Retrieves all child entities that match type.

Consider this a runtime only method, rather than calling it during constructor or initialization phases.

getEntityById( id : String, ?agenda : EAgenda, ?isBubbleDown : Bool, ?isBubbleUp : Bool, ?isBubbleEverywhere : Bool ) : IEntity

parameters
id The unique identifier of the entity you want to retrieve.
?agenda Used to filter results to the specified agenda.
?isBubbleDown Set to true if you want to search this object's children for the requested entity.
?isBubbleUp Set to true if you want to search this object's parent for the requested entity.
?isBubbleEverywhere Set to true if you want to search the entire entity traversal stack for the requested entity.
returns
The requested entity or null if no entity with this id was found.
Retrieves the child entity with the specified id.

Consider this a runtime only method, rather than calling it during constructor or initialization phases.

removeEntity( entity : IEntity, ?agenda : EAgenda, ?isRemovedFromView : Bool ) : Void

parameters
entity The entity to remove.
?agenda If set then will only remove the specified entity from this agenda, else will remove from all agendas.
?isRemovedFromView If true the child entity's view will be removed from this object's view.
Removes an entity from this object's children.
